newsitem.title: USA: AIM fund firm says tops $50 bln in assets.
newsitem.headline: AIM fund firm says tops $50 bln in assets.

text.p: AIM Distributors Inc, the retail marketing arm of AIM Management Group Inc, said it has topped the $50 billion mark in retail fund net assets under management.
AIM said Strategic Insight, a research firm, has ranked it 12th among mutual fund companies in net assets under management.
AIM merged with Invesco Plc last month.
